description: Enferno Storm Commerce API Client library.
releaseNotes:
Upgraded to Enferno.Public 2.0.0.
Updated references for dependent packages: CommonServiceLocator, Unity and Unity.Interception.
Breakning changes that requires some changes due to renamed namespace.
      
Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration is now located in Unity.Configuration.
Change "using Microsoft.Practices.Unity;" to "using Unity;" in code.
      
Under the conficSections in the config file change:
<section name="unity" type="Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.UnityConfigurationSection, Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration" />
to:
<section name="unity" type="Microsoft.Practices.Unity.Configuration.UnityConfigurationSection, Unity.Configuration" />


## What's new?

### Customers:

- #3061: New property, VatNo on Company and GlobalLocationNo on Address. This later property will only be populated on company invoice addresses.
https://services.enferno.se/api/1.1/docs/index2.html#/Customers/Companies/Company
https://services.enferno.se/api/1.1/docs/index2.html#/Customers/Address/Address

- #3027: New property, Code, on ApplicationRole is now populated.
https://services.enferno.se/api/1.1/docs/index2.html#/Customers/Accounts/ListAccountRoles

- #2953: Two new methods, GetCustomerByInfoType and GetCompanyByInfoType, has been added. Not that these methods are by infotype Code and not Id. This means that the defined info types must have Code set or null will be returned.
https://services.enferno.se/api/1.1/docs/index2.html#/Customers/Customers/GetCustomerByInfoType
https://services.enferno.se/api/1.1/docs/index2.html#/Customers/Companies/GetCompanyByInfoType

## What's fixed?

### Customers:

- #2968: Inactivated application roles did show up in Customer.Account.Roles. This has now been fixed.

- #3109: Support for using Code instead of id has been added for customer and company info.

### Shopping:

- #3109: InfoTypes with invalid ids could be added. This has now been fixed. Moreover support for using Code instead of id has been added as well.

## Miscellaneous changes?

N/A

Regards,

The Storm API Team
title: Enferno Storm Api Client
